mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bale, John to Henry Faulds; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Bale, John to Henry Faulds regarding a denial of adding Faulds's suggested works to the Library of Modern Science due to the specific nature of the volume instead of an appeal to general public/larger sales. Letterhead of Chapman & Hall, Ltd.; 1 page; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
